actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 202.

official_title: A bill to convey land to the University of Nevada at Las Vegas Research Foundation for a research park and technology center.

summary.text: Authorizes the Clark County Department of Aviation to convey a specified parcel of land to the University of Nevada at Las Vegas Research Foundation for the development of a technology research center.

titles.title: A bill to convey land to the University of Nevada at Las Vegas Research Foundation for a research park and technology center.
